channel.title: Infected Hard drive
channel.description:
Hi, just need a bit of advice, i have an old hard drive small about 230gb, it was infected with a few viruses last time i checked, but if i wish to safely install this, do i need to put it onto Slave setup, i will run my computer offline, will not access any files, format the hard drive and scan for viruses using my mcaffe (full version) (i can also enable a lockdown on it)
is that okay? thanx.

item.title: Infected Hard drive
item.dc:creator: Mango_Assassin
item.description:
sersoft:

you don’t need mcaffee or anything as long as you format the HDD before letting windows access it. (format from linux or the windows 7 install DVD)

Thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: Infected Hard drive
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
you don’t need mcaffee or anything as long as you format the HDD before letting windows access it. (format from linux or the windows 7 install DVD)

Read full topic
